channel.title: Comments on: Saving Table Space (Quick And Dirty)
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Data compression (row or page) would be another way to save space, it will even compress nvarchar to varchar if only ASCII is used..you can save up to 60% of table size by turning on compression...of course you need to test because it will use more CPU...but since most databases these days are IO bound and not CPU it should not really be a problem.......BTW...compression is Enterprise Edition and higher only
